description: This file defines the IamRole class, which manages AWS IAM roles, including creation, reading, deletion, and attaching policies. It interacts with AWS via boto3 and is part of an infrastructure-as-code or resource management system.

classes.name: IamRole
classes.description: Represents an AWS IAM Role with methods to create, read, delete, and attach policies, encapsulating AWS IAM role management logic.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates an IAM role in AWS using provided parameters and AWS API client.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the role to be created and attaches policies or policy ARNs.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the IAM role details from AWS and updates internal state.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the IAM role from AWS, detaching policies and removing from profiles.

methods.name: attach_policy_arns
methods.description: Attaches specified managed policy ARNs to the role.

methods.name: attach_policies
methods.description: Attaches IAM policy objects to the role, creating them if necessary.

methods.name: get_arn
methods.description: Retrieves the ARN of the IAM role from AWS.
